alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:10PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Grant and central Hidalgo Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 710 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Windmill. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pyramid Mountains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley
